item.description: SINGLES BIKING. Come join us for a scenic bike ride in Old Saybrook. You can either bring your bike or rent one. We will meet at 11 am at Action Sports, who rent bikes for $25 for 4 hours. Afterward, we’ll go nearby for lunch. For information, call Susan at 860-345-2517. Directions to 1385 Boston Post Road: Rt. 9S to I-95S, take Exit 67, turn left onto Elm Street, turn right onto Ingham Hill Road, turn right onto Boston Post Road (Rt. 1), facility on right. We’ll park there for bike ride.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be outside in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Biking
